backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking gallery-related fixes to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens for light and dark themes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file with favicon, SEO meta tags, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application router defining layout and all main page routes using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Logo component with size variants and fallback text rendering if the image fails.
frontend/src/components/GalleryImage.tsx: Image component for the gallery with error handling and a visual fallback.
frontend/src/components/LogoMotif.tsx: Decorative logo motif component with fallback to a text mark when the image fails.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Reusable section wrapper providing padded containers for page layout.
frontend/src/components/Seo.tsx: Runtime SEO helper that updates document title and meta tags for each page.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and contact information.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header component with navigation links, mobile sheet menu, and action buttons for ordering, booking, and calling.
frontend/src/data/menuData.ts: Defines menu category and item interfaces and exports a large dataset of menu categories with items and pricing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity loading using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks with no current functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling with custom color variables, dark mode definitions, and typography settings.
frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts: Exports centralized paths for brand assets and gallery images used throughout the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with story sections, values list, and SEO metadata for the restaurant.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details, quick actions, and a map section along with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows an image gallery with a lightbox dialog, keyboard handling, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with hero content, cuisine highlights, actions, and brand elements.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Provides a menu page with category grids and mobile accordion layout, using menu data and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/OffersPage.tsx: Renders the restaurant offers page with SEO metadata, a hero section, and a list of promotional offer cards with icons and styled content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, shadows, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues about image rendering and build errors, and lists existing and new feature requests related to gallery fixes and deployment issues.
